author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Federation of Jamaths of Tiruvithankode demanded the government to stop arresting innocent Muslim youths and foisting cases against them.

Addressing a demonstration staged in front of the taluk office here on Friday, the forum said that three youths were recently arrested, linked to crimes not associated with them, and detained under National Security Act. Muslim youths were tortured by the police in the guise of inquiry. The forum demanded immediate withdrawal of cases foisted against the youths since it would affect their future.
title: Forum stages demonstration
